DOC.brief_summary: This study local PCO sponsor , interventional , non-drug study evaluate efficacy health tele-counselling program reduce cardiovascular risk dyslipidemic patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Counselling Advisory Care Health ( COACH ) Program Dyslipidemic Patients .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects newly diagnose dyslipidemias . 2 . Subjects must lipid drug naive eligible statin therapy . 1 . Subjects contact telephone handphone . 2 . Subjects uncontrolled primary hypothyroidism .
